resources.string: Choose the number that is higher. \n Questions can be repeated until you get 20 points

"Congratulations, level passed! \n Do you mind that number 7 is considered the happiest number. There are 7 days a week, seven continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 notes, 7 days of creation and much more. Also, the number 7 is most often the favorite number of people in the world."
Choose a Roman numeral that is larger. \n I can repeat the questions until you get 20 points
"Congratulations, level passed! \n Do you know that you cannot divide by zero?"
